sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-container>
    <v-color-picker v-model="selectedColor" />

    <v-card v-if="selectedColor">
      <v-card-title>
        {{ label }}
      </v-card-title>
      <v-card-text>
        選択した色：{{ selectedColor }}
      </v-card-text>
    </v-card>
  </v-container>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  data() {
    return {
      selectedColor: null,
    }
  },
  computed: {
    label() {
      switch (this.selectedColor) {
        case "red":
          return "赤色の会議";
        case "blue":
          return "青色の会議";
        case "green":
          return "緑色の会議";
        default:
          return "";
      }
    },
  },
};
</script>
